      • setDueDateFromPriority

        void setDueDateFromPriority()
        Deprecated. 
        This functions sets the due date for a verification based on the priority. High and urgent objects are set for 3 days. Normal objects (and objects without a priority) are set to 7 days. Low-priority objects are set for 14 days.
